name: Zombie Survival (Glitcher)
description:
You are the last man on earth, as a failed experiment went wrong which turned everyone into zombies. Your goal is simple, SURVIVE. Kill Zombies and steal their loot. Get better guns and fight your way through the massacre.

NOTE:

The game is in beta meaning there a lot of bugs.

UPDATES:

-Added border

-New Trophy System

-Healthbar fixed

MORE TO COME:

-New enemies 

-Boss

-More guns
